00034 using namespace Hypertable;
00035 using namespace std;
00036 using namespace Hypertable::Config;

00038 namespace {
00039   struct RangeStatsDescending {
00040     bool operator()(const Range::MaintenanceData *x, const Range::MaintenanceData *y) const {
00041       return x->priority > y->priority;
00042     }
00043   };
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 MaintenanceScheduler::MaintenanceScheduler(MaintenanceQueuePtr &queue,
00048                                            RangeStatsGathererPtr &gatherer)
00049   : m_initialized(false), m_scheduling_needed(false), m_queue(queue),
00050     m_stats_gatherer(gatherer), m_prioritizer_log_cleanup(m_stats),
00051     m_prioritizer_low_memory(m_stats) {
00052   m_prioritizer = &m_prioritizer_log_cleanup;
00053   m_maintenance_interval = get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.Maintenance.Interval");
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 void MaintenanceScheduler::schedule() {
00059   RangeStatsVector range_data;
00060   AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *ag_data;
00061   String output;
00062   String ag_name;
00063   String trace_str = "STAT ***** MaintenanceScheduler::schedule() *****\n";
00064   int64_t memory_needed = 0;
00065 
00066   if (low_memory_mode()) {
00067     if (Global::maintenance_queue->pending() < Global::maintenance_queue->workers())
00068       m_scheduling_needed = true;
00069     memory_needed = (Global::memory_limit * 10) / 100;  // 10% of the memory limit
00070   }
00071 
00072   m_stats.stop();
00073 
00074   if (!m_scheduling_needed &&
00075       m_stats.duration_millis() < m_maintenance_interval)
00076     return;
00077 
00078   Global::maintenance_queue->clear();
00079 
00080   m_stats_gatherer->fetch(range_data);
00081 
00082   if (range_data.empty()) {
00083     m_scheduling_needed = false;
00084     m_stats.start();
00085     return;
00086   }
00087 
00088   HT_ASSERT(m_prioritizer);
00089 
00093   {
00094     int64_t revision_user = Global::user_log ? Global::user_log->get_latest_revision() : TIMESTAMP_MIN;
00095     int64_t revision_metadata = Global::metadata_log ? Global::metadata_log->get_latest_revision() : TIMESTAMP_MIN;
00096     int64_t revision_root = Global::root_log ? Global::root_log->get_latest_revision() : TIMESTAMP_MIN;
00097 
00098     for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00099       for (ag_data = range_data[i]->agdata; ag_data; ag_data = ag_data->next) {
00100         if (ag_data->earliest_cached_revision != TIMESTAMP_NULL) {
00101           if (range_data[i]->range->is_root()) {
00102             revision_root = ag_data->earliest_cached_revision;
00103           }
00104           else if (range_data[i]->table_id == 0) {
00105             if (ag_data->earliest_cached_revision < revision_metadata)
00106               revision_metadata = ag_data->earliest_cached_revision;
00107           }
00108           else {
00109             if (ag_data->earliest_cached_revision < revision_user)
00110               revision_user = ag_data->earliest_cached_revision;
00111           }
00112         }
00113       }
00114     }
00115 
00116     trace_str += String("STAT revision_root\t") + revision_root + "\n";
00117     trace_str += String("STAT revision_metadata\t") + revision_metadata + "\n";
00118     trace_str += String("STAT revision_user\t") + revision_user + "\n";
00119 
00120     if (Global::root_log)
00121       Global::root_log->purge(revision_root);
00122 
00123     if (Global::metadata_log)
00124       Global::metadata_log->purge(revision_metadata);
00125 
00126     if (Global::user_log)
00127       Global::user_log->purge(revision_user);
00128   }
00129 
00130   m_prioritizer->prioritize(range_data, memory_needed, trace_str);
00131 
00132   boost::xtime schedule_time;
00133   boost::xtime_get(&schedule_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00134 
00135   for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00136     if (range_data[i]->purgeable_index_memory > 0) {
00137       RangePtr range(range_data[i]->range);
00138       Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskIndexPurge(schedule_time, range, m_stats.starting_access_counter()));
00139     }
00140   }
00141 
00142   struct RangeStatsDescending range_sort_desc;
00143 
00144   sort(range_data.begin(), range_data.end(), range_sort_desc);
00145 
00146   if (!m_initialized) {
00147     // if this is the first time around, just enqueue work that
00148     // was in progress
00149     for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size(); i++) {
00150       if (range_data[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00151           range_data[i]->state == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00152         RangePtr range(range_data[i]->range);
00153         Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskSplit(schedule_time, range));
00154       }
00155     }
00156     m_initialized = true;
00157   }
00158   else {
00159 
00160     for (size_t i=0; i<range_data.size() && range_data[i]->priority > 0; i++) {
00161       if (range_data[i]->needs_split) {
00162         RangePtr range(range_data[i]->range);
00163         Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskSplit(schedule_time, range));
00164       }
00165       else if (range_data[i]->needs_compaction) {
00166         RangePtr range(range_data[i]->range);
00167         Global::maintenance_queue->add(new MaintenanceTaskCompaction(schedule_time, range, false));
00168       }
00169     }
00170 
00171   }
00172 
00173   cout << flush << trace_str << flush;
00174 
00175   m_scheduling_needed = false;
00176 
00177   m_stats_gatherer->clear();
00178 
00179   m_stats.start();
00180 }
